code.description: The offence code from reference data

order_index.description: The offence sequence provided by the Police

title.description: The offence title from reference data
title.example: Driver fail to immediately move a vehicle from a cordoned area on order of a constable

legislation.description: The offence legislation from reference data

wording.description: The particulars of the accused charges
wording.example: Between 06.03.2021 and 22.03.2021 at Derby in the county of Derbyshire, conspired together with Harry Potter to enter as a trespasser

arrest_date.description: The date that the defendant was arrested in relation to this matter

charge_date.description: The date that the defendant was charged in relation to this matter

mode_of_trial.description: Indicates if the offence is either way, indictable only or summary only

start_date.description: The date that the defendant is accused to have started committing this charge

proceedings_concluded.description: Indicates that proceedings for this offence have been concluded, i.e. it has been disposed with final results or withdrawn by the prosecuting authority
